metadata.synopsis: Three tieflings voice their anger at how they're being treated by the druids of the grove. They've been barred from entry into an innermost section while the fdruids conduct a ritual that will ultimately seal off the grove.

0.speaker: Rechel
0.text: Do all the damn rituals you want - we're not leaving 'til it's safe!
0.context: NodeContext: Angry, Shouting at some druids who're trying to force them out of the grove and into danger.

3.speaker: Amek
3.context: NodeContext: Angry, Shouting at some druids who're trying to force them out of the grove and into danger.

4.speaker: Xeph
4.text: You lot're the same as those bloody goblins!
4.context: NodeContext: Angry, Shouting at some druids who're trying to force them out of the grove and into danger.

5.speaker: Xeph
5.text: Keep this up an' you'll have blood on your hands!
5.context: NodeContext: Angry, Shouting at some druids who're trying to force them out of the grove and into danger.

6.speaker: Rechel
6.text: Bloody druids. Making more hassle for us over nothing.
6.context: NodeContext: The tension's been reduced somewhat, but anger still simmers

1.speaker: Amek
1.text: At least they've calmed down now.
1.context: NodeContext: The tension's been reduced somewhat, but anger still simmers

7.speaker: Amek
7.text: Your master let us in here. We're your guests!
7.context: NodeContext: Angry, Shouting at some druids who're trying to force them out of the grove and into danger.

8.speaker: Rechel
8.context: NodeContext: Angry, Shouting in reference to some druids who're trying to force them out of the grove and into danger.

9.speaker: Xeph
9.text: Doesn't change much. We're still trapped.
9.context: NodeContext: The tension's been reduced somewhat, but anger still simmers

11.speaker: Rechel
11.text: A little more room to hide from goblins, at least.
11.context: NodeContext: The tension's been reduced somewhat, but anger still simmers

10.speaker: Amek
10.text: Don't see what's so special about this part. Just more Grove.
10.context: NodeContext: The tension's been reduced somewhat, but anger still simmers

2.speaker: Xeph
2.text: Probably hoarding supplies for themselves. Seems like something they'd do.
2.context: NodeContext: The tension's been reduced somewhat, but anger still simmers
